attributes.action: Distribute money accrued by disabled people living in long term residential care back into the system upon their death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many disabled people accrue a lot of money over the years they have spent living within residential care. Upon their death the money goes to the next of kin. This money should go back into the system where it came from initially as opposed to relatives who may never have even seen the person benefitting
